title: The people to whom Trump talked on the day of the Capitol riot

sentence: Other calls were made to Senate minority leader Mitch McConnell (R-KY), who an aide says declined the call, and Sen. Josh Hawley (R-MO), and Trump spoke for 10 minutes with Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) starting at 9:24 a.m.
author: Travis Gettys
title: Trump’s mysterious last recorded phone call before the Jan. 6 riot was to an ‘unidentified person’

sentence: Trump also talked to Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan and Sen. Tommy Tuberville of Alabama, among other lawmakers.
title: Jan. 6 House panel missing roughly 8 hours of Trump’s phone calls

sentence: Trump also talked to Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan and Sen. Tommy Tuberville of Alabama, among other lawmakers.
author: The Associated Press
title: Jan. 6 panel IDs 8-hour gap in Trump phone records
